nodes.text: Roland Yepez is a storyboard and previsualization artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that is planned to air in Fall of 2008 as a continuation of the animated Star Wars: Clone Wars series that was shown on Cartoon Network in 2003. Roland Yepez also worked in the computer graphics departments for Transformers (2007), Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End (2007), Eragon (2006), Lady in the Water (2006), Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (2006), Mission: Impossible III (2006), The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005), and Rent (2005).
Roland Yepez was also a digital artist for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, released in 2005.
